name: Flappy Bird Plus
description:
This game is currently in a BETA state.

Flappy Bird Plus is a new, better (unofficial) version of the original Flappy Bird, with lots of extra features! 

  • Cosmetics and a shop
  • A two-player mode (W and Space keys)
  • A levelling system, with coins able to be used in the shop
  • Unlockable difficulties
  • Music (Intellect by Yung Logos)

Controls:

  • Space or click to jump. That's literally it lol

You do not need Python 3.11 or PyGame installed to run the executable.
